prompts: Create a dinosaur-like Pokemon with rugged skin and a playful expression.
I want a small, cute Pokemon that resembles a baby dinosaur with big eyes.
Generate a Pokemon that has sharp teeth and a mischievous grin, perfect for adventures.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a tiny T-Rex with earthy colors and a stout body.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that loves to explore forests and has a rocky texture.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of prehistoric creatures and has a charming personality.
Show me a Pokemon that captures the essence of strength and playfulness, with a unique design.
